title: Handfake

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Goomba Sign** (1x): Choose a target to frame as a Koopa role of your choice until the next time a investigate action targets them.
- **Parakoopa Sign** (1x): Twirl it to redirect all of visitors of a target into the last player you targeted.
- **Bob-omb Sign** (1x): Choose a target, their ability will rampage tonight, unless it's an attack.
- **Bowser sign** (1x): Lower Bowser's night requirements for **Flame Breath** by 1. `(Night 2, 5, 8 after 1 use, Night 1, 4, 7 after 2 uses.)`

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once per game you will get an extra use of all abilities if you used them all.

desc:
